prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sharp fins and a fierce expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a vibrant blue body with a golden tail and a menacing look.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a shark, featuring bright colors and unique patterns.

Generate a Pokemon that lives in the sea and has a mix of sharp edges and smooth curves.
Make a Pokemon with a predatory look, using dark tones accented with lighter shades.
